title: Mondragão
body: This family name, which we believe to be extinct in Madeira, came from João Rodrigues Mondragão, a noble Biscayan who settled in Madeira around 1500 and established a majorat in the town of Calheta. See Castilian Domain.

João Rodrigues Mondragão: Noble Biscayan who settled in Madeira around 1500 and established a majorat in the town of Calheta
